mapper.select: select co.userid,gender,name,username,address,detail_address,createDate,count(co.id) as "whatCoupons" from coupon co, user us where us.id= co.userid group by us.id;
select co.id,gender,name,username,address,detail_address,createDate,count(co.id) as "whatCoupons",co.salePrice,co.reason from coupon co, user us where us.id= co.userid group by us.id
mapper.update: update coupon set code =#{code} , validityStart=#{validityStart} , validityEnd=#{validityEnd},userid=#{userId} , availability=true ,availability= #{availability} ,reason =#{reason} where id=#{id}
